message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product for $18,000. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity that I think you won't want to pass up!
I appreciate your enthusiasm, Alice, but $18,000 is way above my budget. I'm interested in this product, but I'm only willing to pay $12,000. Let's see if we can find a compromise.
I understand that $18,000 is a bit steep, but I'm not willing to go as low as $12,000. I can meet you halfway and offer it to you for $15,000. This is my final offer for now.
Alice, $15,000 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $13,000, but that's my final offer. I'm serious about buying this product, but I need to stay within my budget.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Bob, but $13,000 is still a bit short of what I'm looking for. I'm willing to meet you in the middle again, but this time I'll go up to $14,000. That's my best and final offer for now.
